scripts.build:css: postcss src/style.css -o build/style.css && STYLE_FILE=$(jq -r '."style.css"' build/manifest.json) && perl -i -pe"s/style.css/${STYLE_FILE}/g" build/*.html && perl -i -pe"s/style.css/${STYLE_FILE}/g" build/**/*.html && perl -i -pe"s/style.css/${STYLE_FILE}/g" build/**/**/*.html && rm build/manifest.json
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css
